General.Name: Xinjiang Tianfu Energy Co Ltd
General.Description: Xinjiang Tianfu Energy Co., Ltd. engages in the production and supply of electricity and heat in the Shihezi area in Xinjiang. It is involved in the supply of water and natural gas; and building construction business. The company was formerly known as Xinjiang Tianfu Thermoelectric Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Xinjiang Tianfu Energy Co., Ltd. in July 2014. Xinjiang Tianfu Energy Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Shihezi, China.
General.Address: No. 2, Beiyi East Road, Shihezi, China, 832000
